message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee the quality of every item, our records show a 50% chance of receiving a high-quality product. Given the uncertainty, the price is set at $100000. Please consider the potential value of $2000000 if it turns out to be high-quality. Thank you for your interest!
I'd like to buy the product, but I'd appreciate it if you could tell me the quality of the product after I make my decision.
